CustomField.description: Indicates the standard unit of measurement or sale for the product or service being offered, providing a basis for pricing and quantity calculations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the standard unit in which this product or service is typically measured or sold (e.g., 'each,' 'hour,' 'kWh'). This will help accurately represent quantities and pricing in grants, deals, or agreements.
CustomField.label: Unit
